mapper.insert: insert into t_jsdata ( id, domain, uid, url, referer, ua, dns, tcp, white, dom, load_time, ready, redirect, unload, request, render, size, errors_time, w, h, pixel, gpu, create_time ) values( #{id}, #{domain}, #{uid}, #{url}, #{referer}, #{ua}, #{dns}, #{tcp}, #{white}, #{dom}, #{load}, #{ready}, #{redirect}, #{unload}, #{request}, #{render}, #{size}, #{errors}, #{w}, #{h}, #{pixel}, #{gpu}, sysdate() )
